text: Ulzana's Raid is a 1972 American western movie directed by Robert Aldrich and starring Burt Lancaster, Richard Jaeckel, Bruce Davison, Douglass Watson, Joaquin Martinez. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 movies Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Aldrich
title: Ulzana's Raid
